FirstTimeaftertutorial.Text: Let’s take a look at the materials we have gathered from our expedition!
We can use these materials to craft some new gear or weapons. Let’s try it out!

Aftersuccessfullycrafting.Text: Crafting new gear and weapons allow you to unlock more spells to use on your adventures!
These will help you overcome the obstacles that you may encounter!

Aftersuccessfullycrafting.Bold: associate specific materials to corresponding equipment!
Aftersuccessfullycrafting.Text: Remember different types of equipment require different materials. Try to associate specific materials to corresponding equipment!
